@bbizcool @NerdAboutTown Words hurt and being shamed for your size is horrible, but there are very real structural barriers for fat people that just aren’t there for thin people.

@bbizcool @NerdAboutTown That’s horrible and wrong, but it’s not the same as being less likely to be hired in spite of qualifications, being paid less for the same work, being sentenced more harshly for the same crime etc all because you’re fat.

@bethanyrutter Depends what you want from it. For definition, use it as a contour in the hollows of your cheekbones and anywhere else you would contour. If you want that sunkissed look, apply it where the sun would naturally hit your face.
